channel.title: Npc ranging
channel.description:
Basically when you range any npc,they walk towards you but don't attack you. Its pretty much safespotting, but in a messed up way.
I'm using 317 PI erasedpkz, please help me with this!

item.title: Npc ranging
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

search for your npc attacking player method & check whats needed to make them attack,
then follow the process that gets executed when you attack, and search where it went wrong and didnt put the needed variables right

Read full topic
